TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportedFromTypeLibAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ImportedFromTypeLibAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ImportedFromTypeLibAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示在組件內定義的型別原來是定義在型別程式庫中。

span.span: Indicates that the types defined within an assembly were originally defined in a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以將此屬性套用至組件，雖然[Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)通常會套用它為您時它的類型程式庫。You can apply this attribute to assemblies, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it a type library. 屬性的主要用途是要擷取的型別資訊的原始來源。The primary use of the attribute is to capture the original source of the type information. 例如，您可以作為呼叫 A.dll interop 組件匯入 A.tlb 並且 B.dll 參考 A.dll 的組件。For example, you can import A.tlb as an interop assembly called A.dll and have assembly B.dll reference A.dll. 當您匯出 B.dll B.tlb 至時，這個屬性會導致 B.tlb 改為指向 A.tlb A.dll 所指向的參考。When you export B.dll to B.tlb, this attribute causes the references in B.tlb that point to A.dll to point instead to A.tlb. 這應該不與混淆，指定個別的型別在 COM 中實作This should not be confused with the , which specifies that an individual type is implemented in COM. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CPP/codefile3.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CS/codefile3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ImprovedInteropSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/VB/codefile3.vb#3)]

span.span: The location of the original type library file.

summary.span: 使用原始型別程式庫檔案 (Type Library File) 的名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the original type library file.

span.span: The name of the original type library file.
